definitions.definition: An activity that one enjoys doing in one's spare time .
examples: I like to collect stamps from different countries as a hobby .

definitions.definition: ( equestrianism ) An extinct breed of horse native to the British Isles , also known as the Irish Hobby .
Synonym of hobby horse ( “ a favorite topic ” ) .

main_definition: An activity that one enjoys doing in one's spare time .
secondary_definitions: ( equestrianism ) An extinct breed of horse native to the British Isles , also known as the Irish Hobby .
Synonym of hobby horse ( “ a favorite topic ” ) .

definitions.definition: Any of four species of small falcons in the genus Falco , especially Falco subbuteo .

main_definition: Any of four species of small falcons in the genus Falco , especially Falco subbuteo .
